Package CAMs

Class StudentRegistrationCamps

java.lang.Object
CAMs.StudentRegistrationCamps
All Implemented Interfaces:
CAMs.RegistrationCamps
public class StudentRegistrationCamps extends Object implements CAMs.RegistrationCamps
Manages the registration process for students, including checking eligibility, registering for camps, and providing information about registered camps.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas
